items.content_html: Explore Kubernetes features with ease using kube-demo. This repository contains all necessary Kubernetes resources for deploying and managing a lightweight application within a Kubernetes cluster. Ideal for hands-on demonstrations and learning Kubernetes orchestration.

Ideal for hands-on demonstrations and learning Kubernetes orchestration.

items.content_html: The xxAPI repository is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify common DOM manipulation tasks, handle AJAX requests, manage cookies and local storage, and provide utilities for smooth scrolling, function throttling, script loading, URL manipulation, and random data generation.
items.title: N3M1K/xxapi:  The xxAPI repository is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify common DOM manipulation tasks, handle AJAX requests, manage cookies and local storage, and provide utilities for smooth scrolling, function throttling, script loading, URL manipulation, and random data generation.

items.content_html: This project is a lightweight web-based music player implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features basic functionality such as play/pause, next song, and volume control.
items.title: sumitti/Music_Player:  This project is a lightweight web-based music player implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features basic functionality such as play/pause, next song, and volume control.
